instruction: Provide the HTML content for an email that encourages users to register.
output:
Hey there!

We'd like to invite you to join the amazing community that is using our service. You'll benefit from access to a range of amazing features and services.

Sign up now and take advantage of:

  • Access to exclusive content
    • < li>A dedicated customer service team < li>Unlock exclusive discounts

Click here to register now!

We look forward to welcoming you to our community.
